details.brokersummary:
Large 3 bedroom located at Bleecker and Cypress at the Ridgewood / Bushwick border!
Close to the Myrtle Wyckoff L / M trains, Boobie Trap Bar, Milk & Pull Coffee, Klom Klorm Restaurant, Old Stanley's Bar, Talon Bar, Bushwick Diner, etc.
- 2 king sized bedrooms on opposite ends - full sized 3rd bedroom in middle - all rooms have natural light - newly renovated
Available 1/15 SMALL pets OK No broker fee

1 bed 1 bath in gorgeous area of Crown Heights
- Elevator building - Newly renovated - Huge bedroom - Big living area with window - On-site super - Stainless steel appliances
Available 1/1 Small pets OK No broker fee

MASSIVE true 2 bedroom in Crown Heights!
- 2 big bedrooms - Large living room - Hardwood floors
No broker fee Available 12/15

Awesome corner unit 2 bedroom in prime Williamsburg!
- no broker fee
2 nice bedrooms Good size living area with lots of sunlight Separate kitchen area Heat and hot water included Live in super
Great location ? near JMZ trains and countless locals restaurants, bars, and coffee shops. The Rosemont, Williamsburg Pizza, Fiction Bar/Cafe, Domino Sugar Factory Park, Williamsburg Bridge, Pies-N-Thighs, Peter Luger, etc
Small pets welcome

Beautifully NEWLY RENOVATED 1 bed in Williamsburg
Located at Rodney and South 4th 3 minutes door to platform ? Marcy JMZ
Brand new renovation with TONS of natural light New kitchen / bath Stainless steel appliances
Located directly at the entrance to the Williamsburg Bridge, this apartment perfect for any commute into the city. 3 blocks from the Marcy JMZ. 10 minute commute into the city. Around the corner from Broadway, which has everything you need.
Heat and Hot water are included This apartment is an amazing deal in this location, do not miss out!
Available 2/1 Small pets welcome

Myspace Exclusive!
Gorgeous one bedroom PLUS home office on Crown Street in elevator building. Large living room. Stainless steel kitchen with exposed brick. Large bedroom with closets and storage. Heat and hot water included. Oak wood floors.
Near the 2 and 5 trains.Near Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum and short walk to Franklin Ave to all the restaurants and bars.
Dec 1 move in Small pets welcome No broker fee

Incredible 3 bedroom - right by the park!
- 3 bedrooms - 1 bath - hardwood floors - heat and hot water included
Around the corner from Prospect Park! Pasta Louise, Nighthawk Cinema, Dog Day Afternoon, Fonda, WINNER Cafe, Greenwood Park Bar, etc all nearby. Close to F and G trains for easy transportation.
No broker fee Available now SMALL pets OK

2br duplex with basement for additional storage! Shared courtyard Hardwood floors Modern renovations Amazing location If you need a lot of space, this is the one. See video. Note additional toilet in the downstairs bathroom has been capped off to avoid any flooding issues. No fee pets ok Call or text to see right away

Lovely two bedroom apartment located in the heart of Bushwick. The apartment features hardwood floors throughout and a renovated kitchen with stainless steal appliances and butcher block bar/island. The large bedrooms have plenty of natural light to start your morning off right. The building is pet friendly and has laundry facility in the basement so no need to haul those heavy laundry bags. Great location just one block from Maria Hernandez Park, Jefferson L train stop and surrounded by popular taverns and cafes. No fee!

2 Bed w/ 4? ? 14? private terrace in a brand new elevator building!
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closets
Building features: ButterflyMX intercom Multiple laundry rooms Huge Roof deck Zipcars available Parking is subject to availability ($300/mo extra for designated spot) Bike storage State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets ok! NO BROKER FEE! Just 1st and security to move in!
Call or text to view the right away. This is priced to GO!

Huge renovated 2.5br. These have been used at 3brs in the past and each room has a private entrance and window but very little common space. Works a lot better as a large 2br with one of the additional rooms used as common space. You?ll get a sense of the space by seeing the video. If you can?t see it, please see the listing on StreetEasy or text me and I can send it to you. note . the apartment is unfurnished and do not come with bed frames show in photos
This apt is beautifully renovated with: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Windows in all bedrooms plus a small skylight in the living room Heat/AC units in each room allowing you to control temp per room (huge savings on utilities) Laundry in the building Owner will purchase standing closets if needed. Fantastic locations with tons of local spots to enjoy Located 2min walk to L and M train lines in prime Bushwick (myrtle/wyckoff stop of L/M)
Pets ok No broker fee Just 1st and security to move in
Call or text to take a look right away!

Hardwood floors Renovated kitchen and bath Stainless steel appliances. Laundry in the building Less than a 5 minute walk from the BOTH the L and M train. Right in the center of Bushwick steps away from all you favorite local spots!
NO BROKER FEE! Just 1st and security to move in Pets ok

Right in the middle of Carroll Gardens/Gowanus and just blocks away from Barclays Center you can enjoy all of the Shops, Restaurant, Bars and Entertainment from these Amazing Neighborhoods!

Virtual tours available!Beautiful apartment in Greenpoint, prime location!This apartment features a spacious living room, 3 queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, 2 modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from McCarren & McGolrick Parks, in addition to dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Keg & Lantern, Brooklyn Barge, TORST, Spritzenha, Northern Territory, Five Leaves, Enid's, Paulie Gee's, Sauvage, Milk & Roses, Calexico.mShort commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

Beautiful 3 bed / 1 bath apartment in Bushwick, prime location!
This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse.
Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short distance to the J, M trains.
